title: Soul33 - Wellness & Meditation App
description: Led end-to-end development serving 15,000+ users with 4.7 rating. Features real-time group chat supporting 200+ concurrent sessions, centralized audio playback with offline tracking, and background downloads. Enhanced performance by 40% through New React Native Architecture.

title: Yoke App - Social Wellness Platform
description: Developed Instagram-like Reels feature with advanced video optimization. Integrated live streaming with ZegoCloud SDK for real-time audience interaction. Built comprehensive creator profiles with optimized tabs. Reduced re-renders by 40% through component memoization and lazy loading.
